formula.name: 4th Burning Ship Partial Real Mbar
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Cr; Xin = Ci - 4 * abs(Xr) * Xi * (Xr2 - Xi2);
formula.perturbation: xrn = 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 + 4 * Xi * xi2 * xi + xi2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * Xr2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 24 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 6 * xr2 * Xi2 - 12 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * xr2 * xi2 + cr; xin = abs(Xr + xr) * (12 * Xi2 * xi + 12 * Xi * xi2 + 4 * xi2 * xi - 8 * xr * Xr * Xi - 4 * xr2 * Xi - 4 * xi * Xr2 - 8 * xr * xi * Xr - 4 * xr2 * xi) + diffabs(Xr, xr) * (4 * Xi2 * Xi - 4 * Xr2 * Xi) + ci;
